Module.Content: <center> <FORM> <INPUT type="button" value="Add Smilies/graphics" onClick="window.open('https://sites.google.com/site/fjampages/add-graphics','addgraphics','width=275,height=400')"> </FORM></center> <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="FORUMS" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#000000; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>Get HELP through</option> <option value="https://www.facebook.com/groups/fjamstudios/permalink/824791514218680/">Facebook</option> </select>
